There is no public transit system in Grand Prairie.  Taxi, rental car (Avis or Enterprise) or private car are the available options.  Select hotels may offer shuttle service to and from area airports.

value: content=A popular state park that offers fishing, camping, hiking and biking trails.
content=A Corp of Engineers Lake with boating and fishing opportunities. Along the shores enjoy camping and hiking.
content=Catch a live performance at the 6,350 seat hall for concerts, shows and events.
content=Newly restored, this 408 seat theater hosts performing and visual arts, as well as music, dance, drama and film.
name=Dr. H.V. Copeland Home - Grand Prairie Museum
content=972-263-9588. This home has a State Landmark as well as a Grand Prairie Landmark. It was the historic home of Dr. Horace Victor Copeland (1875-1969).
name=Alliance Skate Park at Grand Prairie
content=972-262-4GPX. A skateboarders paradise! Lessons - Skate Camps - Concerts - Lock-ins - And More! It also boasts a full skate shop with shoes, clothing and skateboards! Open year round.
content=Opened May 2008, this minor league ballpark features a Kids Zone, restaurants, sports bar, cigar bar and swimming pool. It seats 4,000 and offers 13 luxury suites.
name=Lone Star Park at Grand Prairie

content=972-263-RACE. World-Class Thoroughbred Horse racing at its finest! The track features a 7-level, glass-enclosed, climate-controlled Grandstand building with penthouse suites, terraced track-side dining room, box seats and outdoor seating. The Post Time Pavilion boasts more than 150 television screens, a sports bar and restaurant. See live horse racing via simulcast from top tracks around the world.
content=Flea Market featuring over 3,500 vendors, kiddie rides, arcade games and a wide variety of state-fair-style foods. Open every Saturday and Sunday, year-round.

There are a number of eateries ranging from specialty restaurants to family style buffets to fast food.

content=All smoke free establishment and an ideal location to the nearest airport, DFW, which is just minute’s away. Holiday Inn Express & Suites Grand Prairie is a four-story hote
name=La Quinta Grand Prairie Taxas Hotel
address=2131 W I-20, Grand Prairie, TX 75052

content=La Quinta Grand Prairie is a boutique hotel in Grand Prairie, TX near Arlington attractions that offers spacious rooms and suites, meeting space, free breakfast and wireless internet and Texas getaway packages.

content=Redwood Inn & Suites is north of downtown Grande Prairie.  Redwood Inn offers 92 rooms with complimentary shuttle service, fitness area, salt-water swimming pool, waterslide, whirpool, business centre, and more.
